channel.title: Items help please
channel.description: Well for the past day ive been adding shops and editing them and i know im doing everything exactly right but there is no items in it or no header i am using aubory and i put all the new items like torva pernix and what be there but they dnt show in the shop here is what i am doing when i spawn the npc 553 then i got to the action handler and put the openshop code there changing the case to 553 then i make the shop shop number would be 8 also changing the number in action handler to 8 also and then i just type the item id i want then tab and then number of items but nothing shows in the shop???

item.title: Items help please
item.dc:creator: @eDIT1 -eDIT-
item.description:
@eDIT1 wrote:
